summary: Anubis from Smite in Skyrim as an armor!
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][b]What is this?[/b]
[/size]
-This is a mod that adds the god model from Smite's Anubis into Skyrim; this was done to test out modding for Skyrim. After encouragement from a friend to upload this I went ahead and did so.


[size=6]To install the mod manually (without Nexus Mod Manager) do the following:[/size]

Step 1: Download the mod manually

Step 2: Extract the folders inside the "data" folder in the .rar file that downloads to your computer

Step 3: Place those extracted folders within your Skyrim "data" folder



[b][size=6]Note: You cannot craft this armor in game; there is no recipe for it. In that case, to spawn this armor, do the following:[/size]
[/b]
Step 1: Open console ("~" key on keyboard by default)

Step 2: Type in "help anubis"

Step 3: The console should output the Anubis model's mesh id in console.

Step 4: Type in "player.additem ####### 1" whereÂ ####### constitutes the model's mesh id number in Step 3.

Enjoy the armor mod!

-CaptainPawn


[b][size=6]This armor should work for all player races in Skyrim; male or female.[/size][/b]
author: CaptainPawn
